project_preview_description.text: A small Chrome extension to streamline Git-based document composition workflows. Over 500 installs!

project_description.text: Open in StackEdit is a simple Chrome extension I created to make it easy to open GitHub or GitLab directories in StackEdit, a popular online Markdown editor. I created it to make my life a bit easier, but it ended up gaining a non-negligible user base, so that's nice.
